fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP 105, LEVEL 1, THE PULSE, 28 BEACH ROAD, REPULSE BAY, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港淺水灣海灘道28號THE PULSE第一層105 鋪

result.adr_address: 28 Beach Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 28 Beach Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Amalfitana Artisan Pizza Bar

reviews.text: Nice view. Very limited beer selection (4 generic Italian brands,  that's all). The pizza is of train station fast-food quality. At least shouldn't mislead with 'artisan'.

The food is good. The setting is beautiful (overlooking the beach). Such a shame the service is overall terrible. The staff is quite bad at hiding their annoyance at any request and they always seem bothered by anything you might ask. And overall inattentive- very unpleasant experience ... A few lovely staff though to be fair (including the manager who really should look at how some of his staff is behaving!)

Pizza.  Pizza.  The first time I visited The Pulse, I noticed this place with the other eateries lined along the downstairs facing the beach and waterfront.  I was lucky enough to have an opportunity to meet some people in my hotel who wanted to find a nice place to "chill".  So I brought a couple of them here to hangout.  The staff is nice, and pizza is good with a great beach atmosphere.  Go and check it out!
lovely..for pizzas. misses having a free flow option ...
The staff is nice and got the food ready at exact time requested. The signature pizza is so yummy. I would say the best pizza in HK!  Love it.

result.adr_address: Level 1 The Pulse, 28 Beach Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Level 1 The Pulse, 28 Beach Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Pure South - The Pulse

reviews.text: Rude staff - starting to think this is a common occurrence for all Pure facilities. This yoga teacher actually yelled at me in class and followed me down to the changing room to continue yelling at me for bringing my phone into the yoga studio. I understand their policy of not allowing phones into the studio but due to my work nature I have to have my phone at all times and I was not even talking on it or using it - that teacher just did not even allow the phone to be present in class (and I'm hardly the only one who has a phone in the studio). When I complained to the studio they merely said policy is policy and that if I'm that busy and can't leave my phone then I might as well don't go there for class. Wow. Such friendly staff - makes you all zen and calm after a class. Not.
Nice.....

result.vicinity: Level 1 The Pulse, 28 Beach Road, Repulse Bay

result.adr_address: 28 Beach Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 28 Beach Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: The Pulse

reviews.text: It was a great place! Good location next to repulse bay with restaurants of different cuisines. I enjoyed the beer festival very much, good spots for photo taking and the food and and beer were stunning! Perfect for weekend activities.
Nice location in the rooftop. Good unique beers to try out, great view with the bay and very special ladder for photos. Wish it's bigger and more stalls.

Went to the Pirate's Beer Fest today and had a total blast.  There's a great selection of food and beer available, staff are uber friendly and helpful.  The game stalls were fun as well, won myself a frog and banana plushie.  There are cabanas on one side of the venue and great photo taking spots. Overall was a good day out!
Nice place. Terrace on the beach with premium beers. Highly recommendable
Nice beach with many amenities and a grocery store all within an area.

reviews.text: 去送貨😎😎😎

It was a great place! Good location next to repulse bay with restaurants of different cuisines. I enjoyed the beer festival very much, good spots for photo taking and the food and and beer were stunning! Perfect for weekend activities.

本星期的海賊醉爆嘉年華 有美麗沙灘有樓梯打卡位有免費啤酒任飲
真係十分抵玩，職員很善良送很多玩具給我們
商場冷氣大又多野食
推薦chill下
Nice location in the rooftop. Good unique beers to try out, great view with the bay and very special ladder for photos. Wish it's bigger and more stalls.

海賊醉爆嘉年華有打卡位有酒飲有遊戲玩
最後有贏左公仔，真係超抵玩，本身淺水灣景都好靚商場又多野食，推薦!
